talk.author: did:plc:gdruabgkyii45m7zocrxmbfh
talk.utter: I've read many many articles I can't tell you which one the in utero part came from. And we don't have conclusive evidence yet but it's really starting to pile up.

talk.author: did:plc:u4xdz3o5miyquig643bnbrqk
talk.utter: Ok. As I said, it was a serious question. Seems like an explosion of trans folks the last few years and one has to wonder where it all came from and why.

talk.author: did:plc:gdruabgkyii45m7zocrxmbfh
talk.utter: Well as far as the explosion of trans people you really have three different groups being conflated together as the trans community. One there's transsexuals like me who have physical dysphoria which is likely caused by a neurological sex that doesn't match the rest of our body ðŸ§µ(1/10)

talk.author: did:plc:gdruabgkyii45m7zocrxmbfh
talk.utter: Two you have the transgender community who have social dysphoria which is nonbiological but they still want to transition unlike me it's not a medical necessity for them instead it's a cosmetic procedure & transgender people are part of a countercultural movement against patriarchal gender roles.(2)

talk.author: did:plc:gdruabgkyii45m7zocrxmbfh
talk.utter: Finally the media is conflating AGP fetishist with actual trans people. AGP is an acronym for autogynophile. These are people who have watched a lot of porn and have fetishized womanhood. These people usually become porn creators after they transition. These people falsely claim to be trans.(3/10)

talk.author: did:plc:lsntitg47tuqnngal6rfepj3
talk.utter: Oh my God can you imagine what this girl's closet smells like? Just how fucking deep inside can you be to hate others just because they like their body (and because their body is similar to yours and that grosses you out). I'm so sorry for your misery.

talk.author: did:plc:gdruabgkyii45m7zocrxmbfh
talk.utter: I don't hate anyone, I hate the porn industry but that's not a hatred of a specific person. I'll be the first to admit I have a lot of issues to work through but self-hatred is not one of them.
